name: Barnyard Farm Animal Sounds Puzzles Games For Toddlers Free
name_original: Barnyard Farm Animal Sounds Puzzles Games For Toddlers Free
description:
Do you have a little one about that wants to learn about farm animals and have fun? Then get ready for some smiles, giggles, and learning with the farm animals for toddlers Activity App! Your little one will have so much fun playing farm games, hearing real animal sounds, and seeing the farm animals dance to music in this activity app designed for all ages and first time app users.

When you download the farm animals sounds and games Activity App you’ll get a farmload of fun and:
8 Farm Animals Sounds- See the farm animals dancing AND hear their sounds! So much fun for all ages!
8 Farm Animal Flash Cards- Simply tap the interactive cards and hear the real animal sound and thier names.
Farm Animal and Farm Fun Match Games- Designed for ages 2 and up these matching games will delight and help them recognize the animals they are learning about.
Farm and Food Relations Game- Learn about what animals eat in this fun and interactive game designed for all ages!

Farm Animals Sounds
Farm animals animations will delight all ages! Simply tap the animal and get taken to a page where the animla is dancing to funny and cute music and hear their real sound as they dance. It's giggle filled interactive fun and a great example of learning through play!

Farm Animal Flash Cards
See the pictures of real farm animals and tap them to hear thier real names and sound. These flashcards are a wonderful way to help little ones learn farm animals and the real sound they make and is designed for all ages.

Farm Matching Games
Your little one will have a blast playing with farm animals, farm equipment, fun food, and in these farm animals fun matching games. Playing the fire truck kids games matching games is hugely engaging and playing the fire truck games for kids activity app match games will also promote:
-Fine motor skills.
-Memory and recognition skills.
-Vocabulary and language.
-Farm animal and farm fun!

Farm and Food Relations Game
This interactive super fun game teaches children what animals eat and where they live! By choosing between different picture options your little one will get to decide which food goes with which animal. So fun and playing this farm relations game will also promote:
-Animal and food recognition.
-Memory skills.
-Vocabulary and language.

Design Team: Nancy, Deborah, Sam, Thomas & Belle-Ann.

Have a delight-filled time playing with farm animals and learning their names in the Farm Animal Sounds and Games Activity App and let your child have fun learning through play with a Play n' Learn App!
